name: Gokoban
description:
Gokoban is an open-source 3D puzzle game written in Go. You control the Go gopher, and your objective in each level is to push the boxes until they are all on top of the yellow pads. There are elevators that help you reach high places and move boxes up and down. Levels are read from text files in /levels so you can easily modify them and even create new ones.

It was created using G3N for the April-July 2017 Gopher Game Jam.
